name: Silk Bloomers
description:
Beautiful, one-off design, Silk bloomers, designed by Victoria McWhirter.

Vintage inspired shape and an original design.

Bloomers are made from silk and would comfortably fit a size 6 up to a 10, as they are elasticated both at the waist and leg.

These bloomers have proved very popular and I do have two pairs to sell; one that would fit a size 6/8 and another which would fit a size 8/10.

They're really lovely and would make a great addition to anyone's summer wardrobe.

name: Our Vacation - Silk Head/Neckscarf
description:
Quirky, vintage vacation inspired silk scarf. Original design by Victoria McWhirter.

Scarf design is taken from personal photography of childhood holidays; so it really is a piece that would look great for summer.

If you would like to see any close up images of the scarf, please feel free to contact me.

name: Silk Head/Neckscarf (Green)
description:
Beautiful, original design silk head/neckscarf, designed by Victoria McWhirter.

Mint green colour, perfect for summer. Adorned with a beautiful, vintage inspired motif design. Very feminine and floral.

This is an original design.

If you would like to see some more close up images of the scarf, please get in touch.

name: Silk Head/Neckscarf
description:
Beautiful, original design silk scarf, designed by Victoria McWhirter.

Scarf is adorned with vintage inspired motifs and floral design.

Ideal for wearing as a headscarf or neckscarf.

This is a one-off piece.

If you would like to see any more close up pictures of the scarf, feel free to get in touch.
